casesTable.output: Credit - Please click the secure link above to view the invoice and pay via credit card. If you prefer to pay by phone, please call (604) 299-3330 to speak to our finance department.
E-Transfer - Please remit payment to info@civicblinds.com.

Cheque - To ensure the production or installation of your order is on time, please arrange pickup or dropoff of the cheque with Alyssa Watkins. Please call (604) 299-3330 or email her at alyssa@civicblinds.com.

Cash - To ensure the production or installation of your order is on time, please arrange pickup or dropoff of the money with Alyssa Watkins. Please call (604) 299-3330 or email her at alyssa@civicblinds.com.
Direct deposit - Our finance department will contact you shortly if we have yet to discuss void cheques and other documents needed to process payment.

50/50% - Civic Blinds will submit your order into the production queue once we receive the 50% deposit (non-refundable), with the remaining balance due on the installation day. Please note that once an order is submitted, it cannot be altered or cancelled.

30/70% - Civic Blinds will submit your order into the production queue once we receive a deposit of 30% of the total invoice amount (non-refundable), with the remaining balance due on the installation day. Please note that once an order is submitted, it cannot be altered or cancelled.

mapper.html:
Hi , {{43.FName[]}}

Thank you for your recent purchase. I am sharing with you a copy of your invoice. Kindly remit payment at your earliest convenience as per the instructions and terms noted below.
Invoice Link:{{2.mappable_column_values.link.url}}
Payment Method: {{64.output}}
Payment Terms: {{65.output}}
Production Time: {{2.mappable_column_values.timerange.text}}

I am here to assist you with any questions regarding payment, production and installation. Please do not hesitate to contact me at any time.

Thank you, and have a wonderful day!

Best Regards
Alyssa


Alyssa Watkins 
Office Administrator, Civic Blinds Inc. 

Phone (604) 299-3330   Mobile (778) 262-2107

Website www.civicblinds.com   Email alyssa@civicblinds.com

Address 2172-1055 W Georgia St. Vancouver V6E 3P3
